text: Aventura is a Bachata-R&B; music group from New York City. They became popular worldwide with their hit single Obsesi√≥n in 2003/2004. ==Members== * Anthony "Romeo" Santos, lead singer and featured composer * Leny Santos, guitarist, producer/arranger * Max Santos, bass guitar * Henry Santos Jeter, singer and composer ==Discography== * Generation Next, 1997, Label: Premium Latin / Mach 1 * We Broke the Rules, 2002, Label : KTE * Love & Hate (Amor Y Odio), 2003, Label : KTE * Unplugged, 2004 *God's Project, 2005, Label: Mach 1 ==References== ==Other websites== *Official site Category:1994 establishments in the United States Category:1990s American music groups Category:1990s establishments in New York (state) Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:2011 disestablishments in the United States Category:American boy bands Category:American R&B; bands Category:Latin music Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2011 Category:Musical groups established in 1994 Category:Musical groups from New York City Category:MTV Video Music Award winners
title: Aventura
